question: Which Union Minister represented India in the 15th East Asia Summit?
explanation:
Union External Affairs Minister of India S. Jaishankar represented India in the 15th East Asia Summit, which was recently held virtually.
The East Asia Summit is a premier forum in the Asia-Pacific region which was founded in the year 2005. Apart from the 10 ASEAN member states, the Summit includes India, China, Japan, Republic of Korea, Australia, New Zealand, United States and Russia.
